name: Shred & Butter
description: Participants learn skateboarding tricks on a variety of ramps and obstacles at a skate park with a supervisor. Participants should have their own equipment. Helmets are mandatory to participate. Elbow and knee pads are strongly recommended.
fullDescription: Participants learn skateboarding tricks on a variety of ramps and obstacles at a skate park with a supervisor. Participants should have their own equipment. Helmets are mandatory to participate. Elbow and knee pads are strongly recommended.
whatTheyOffer: Participants learn skateboarding tricks on a variety of ramps and obstacles at a skate park with a supervisor. Participants should have their own equipment. Helmets are mandatory to participate. Elbow and knee pads are strongly recommended.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
